Text.val: 19.11.2014 SH SCR19323 Added email delivery of errorfile to Carrefour Spain
25.10.2012 SH SCR17528 Added GB324 to change encoding of outgoing files
-- Carrefour Spain, used for email delivery
-- Convert UNIX based text-files to Windows format only if program runs nativ on AS400
... convert file from UTF-8 to Belgium BU encoding (in case of errors job tuned already to MSGW within GB324)
... set to 'Y' if move of file from temp to new directory is OK

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/SFER join :1/SFEX on SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 where SFER_SFEX_NO = SFEX_NO and SFER_ERRORCODE >0 and (SFER_HANDLED_ACTION1 > 1 or SFER_HANDLED_ACTION2 > 1) for fetch only

Text.val: -- Write detailed error descriptions to file
... in case of errors in file (detected in BSF400-20A)
... in case of business errors(detected in BSF404A1)
